QuestData.Title: Dangerous Compassion
QuestData.Description: The red dragonflight represents the aspect of life. As such, their blood has healing properties.$B$BThis crate of bandages has been soaked in red dragon blood. It is the last of my supply. May it bring a speedy recovery to your warriors.$B$BWhatever the outcome of your negotiations here, do not forget that you have friends among the Dragonmaw.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Crate of Dragonmaw Bandages back to Warlord Krogg off the coast of Dragonmaw Port.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you bring any hope for our wounded?
QuestData.RewardText: Dragon's Blood!? We best not tell our red dragon allies that we've used these.$B$BStill, it's powerful magic... We'll have our fighting force back in no time.
